description: The N|Solid Runtime is a custom build of Node.js with some additive changes to expose additional internal behaviors and communicate to a downstream service. It runs any Node.js application out of the box and requires zero code-modification to deliver native monitoring and production diagnostics that don't incur latency at scale.
summary: N|Solid is a drop-in alternative to the Node.js runtime, enhanced to deliver low-impact performance insights and greater security for mission-critical Node.js applications.
author: NodeSource,  LLC
